name: 東方乳牛時 ～ Memento of Outwit
name_original: 東方乳牛時 ～ Memento of Outwit
description:
東方乳牛時 ～ Memento of Outwit. by Ryann1908

v1.00a

Memento of Outwit is an entry destinated for the Bullet Hell
Artistry 3 event in Bullet Hell Engines
(https://discord.gg/4wNvvPHxeU), a danmaku contest with the
theme of this edition being "turn a stage 1-3 boss into a
final boss".
